ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/csv header=false var clientkey = now() as String {format: "yyyyMMddHHmmssSSSSs"} var curdate = now() as DateTime {format: "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.000Z"} as Number var birthDate = payload.birthDate as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} ++ "T00:00:00" var uniqueId = uuid() replace "-" with "" --- { 'Client Key' : "CM" ++ clientkey ++ uniqueId[1 to 5], 'First Name': payload.firstName, 'Middle Name': payload.middleName default "", 'Last Name': payload.lastName, 'BirthDate': birthDate as DateTime as Number, 'Height': payload.height default "", 'Weight': payload.weight default "", 'Billing Street': payload.billingStreet default "", 'Billing City': payload.billingCity, 'Billing State': payload.billingState, 'Billing Postal Code': payload.billingPostalCode, 'Billing Country': payload.billingCountry, 'Created Date': curdate
}

%dw 2.0 output application/csv var clientkey = now() as String {format: "yyyyMMddHHmmssSSSSs"} var curdate = now() as DateTime {format: "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.000Z"} as Number var birthDate = payload.birthDate as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} ++ "T00:00:00" var uniqueId = uuid() replace "-" with "" --- { 'Client Key' : "CM" ++ clientkey ++ uniqueId[1 to 5] , 'First Name': payload.firstName, 'Middle Name': payload.middleName default "", 'Last Name': payload.lastName, 'BirthDate': birthDate as DateTime as Number, 'Height': payload.height, 'Weight': payload.weight, 'Billing Street': payload.billingStreet, 'Billing City': payload.billingCity, 'Billing State': payload.billingState, 'Billing Postal Code': payload.billingPostalCode, 'Billing Country': payload.billingCountry, 'Created Date': curdate
}

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map $ filter ($.column_0 == vars.clientKey)

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map $ filter ($.column_0 != vars.clientKey)

%dw 2.0 output application/csv
---
payload map ((customer, indexOfCustomer) -> { 'Client Key': customer.column_0, 'First Name': customer.column_1, 'Middle Name': customer.column_2, 'Last Name': customer.column_3, 'BirthDate': customer.column_4 , 'Height': customer.column_5 default "", 'Weight': customer.column_6 default "", 'Billing Street': customer.column_7 default "", 'Billing City': customer.column_8 default "", 'Billing State': customer.column_9 default "", 'Billing PostalCode': customer.column_10 default "", 'Billing Country': customer.column_11 default ""
})
